abstract: Everlast, whose real name is Erik Schrody, has a new album that presents an angry, bleak view of America on the brink of a crisis.
snippet: Everlast, whose real name is Erik Schrody, has a new album that presents an angry, bleak view of America on the brink of a crisis.
lead_paragraph: Some events change a man's perspective. In the last three years, Everlast says, he toured Iraq to play for the troops and watched with increasing rage as old friends and family members struggled financially after the mortgage crisis and stock market crash. He also married, and he and his wife had a daughter who they learned has cystic fibrosis.

headline.main: Q. and A.: Everlast Sees the 'Ungrateful Living' All Around Him
